name: Christmas is running
description:
The game size in the viewport is bugged, I would advise to play in fullscreen or download the game

Pitch

The nighr before christmas, Jeremy can't hold it anymore, he needs to find the present. He is searches the place inside out to get it.

But if you were the present ... 

What would you do ?

Controls

This Game requires two controllers.

Present 

Left Joystick : move

X : Slow

A : Turn the light off

Children

Left Joystick : move

X : Grab

A : Turn the light on
